key_contents: Add JSON Schema Response Format Support
Extends response_format parameter to accept Pydantic models

patterns_discovered: Incremental feature development with clear phases
Provider-agnostic implementation across OpenAI and Ollama
Comprehensive test strategy with backward compatibility checks
Use of Pydantic for type annotations and schema generation
gotchas_discovered: Environment limitation preventing direct pytest execution
Need for manual verification of test suite
Complex type annotation changes in base protocol

key_achievements: Implemented JSON Schema support for OpenAI provider
Implemented JSON Schema support for Ollama provider

recommendations: Enhance documentation for new response_format capabilities
Consider creating integration tests for more complex scenarios
Document the security restrictions in the test environment
